item.title: Indonesia Selects ‘Sore: Wife From the Future’ for Oscars’ International Feature Race
item.description: Indonesia has selected Yandy Laurens’ “Sore: Wife From the Future” as its entry for the best international feature film category at the 98th Academy Awards. The romantic sci-fi drama, produced by Ceri
